Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the maximum items of a Locate request payload.
        """
kwargs = {'maximum_items': 'invalid'}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'Maximum items must be an integer.',
    payloads.LocateRequestPayload, **kwargs)
args = payloads.LocateRequestPayload(), 'maximum_items', 'invalid'
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'Maximum items must be an integer.',
    setattr, *args)
